name: yelpcamp
description: This project is a campground rent website where users can upload their campsites, add descriptions stablish a price for rental. Other users can then comment on the posted campgrounds. The main tools used in this project were: Cloud9 environment, NodeJs, MongoDb, Express. This project was taken from the Udemy course: The Web Development Bootcamp. By Colt Steele.
author: "Juan Albahaca"
